    • 方法详细资料

      • hangupCalling

        public void hangupCalling(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to hang up the incoming phone or outgoing call on the device, for this user. After calling this, the telephone call of this user on the device will be hung up.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_PHONE} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setDataRoamingDisabled

        public boolean setDataRoamingDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                      boolean disable)
        Enable/disable set data roaming
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disable - set true if disable data roaming
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.

      • isDataRoamingDisabled

        public boolean isDataRoamingDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get data roaming disable state
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.

        Enable/disable set access point name

      • addMdmNumberList

        public boolean addMdmNumberList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> numbers,
                                int blockMode,
                                boolean isOutgoing,
                                boolean isBlackList)
        Add phone number string to black/white list
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        numbers - is added to black/white list.
        blockMode - number match mode.
        isOutgoing - true if number is add to outgoing list.
        isBlackList - true if number is add to black list.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.

      • removeMdmNumberList

        public boolean removeMdmNumberList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> numbers,
                                   int blockMode,
                                   boolean isOutgoing,
                                   boolean removeAll)
        Remove phone number string to black/white list
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        numbers - is added to black/white list.
        blockMode - number match mode.
        isOutgoing - true if number is add to outgoing list.
        removeAll - true if removing all list items.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.

      • isBlockNumber

        public boolean isBlockNumber(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                             java.lang.String number,
                             boolean isOutgoing)
        check if the phone number should be blocked by mdm
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        number - is added to black/white list.
        isOutgoing - true if number is add to outgoing list.
        返回:
        true number should be blocked.

        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        true if disabled Non-Emergency call.

      • setPhoneCallLimitation

        public boolean setPhoneCallLimitation(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                      boolean isOutgoing,
                                      int dateType,
                                      int limitNumber)
        Set phone calls limit times
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        isOutgoing - true for outgoing call
        dateType - set day/week/month limit
        limitNumber - times of limit
        返回:
        true set policy data successfully.

      • removePhoneCallLimitation

        public boolean removePhoneCallLimitation(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                         boolean isOutgoing,
                                         int dateType)
        Remove phone calls limit times
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        isOutgoing - true for outgoing call
        dateType - set day/week/month limit
        返回:
        true remove policy data successfully.

      • isPhoneCallLimitationSet

        public boolean isPhoneCallLimitationSet(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                        boolean isOutgoing)
        Check if phone call limit set
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        isOutgoing - true for checking outgoing call policy
        返回:
        true has set phone call limit.
